reviews.customers_say: Customers find the nightgown comfortable in various temperatures and appreciate its soft fabric that feels nice against the skin. The gown features a knee-length design with appropriate sleeve length, and customers praise its good quality cotton material. They like its appearance, washability, and warmth, with one customer noting it's perfect for chilly fall nights.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and so comfortable. Quality fabric and well made. Cool and yet warm without being hot
items.body: Weight: 160 lb Height: 5' 6" Size: Large. I love this sleep shirt. It covers my shoulders as I get so cold at night. It is extremely soft and feels amazing on my skin. I look forward to wearing them at the end of each day. I love how I can still turn and roll-over at night without getting bound up in the fabric. The neck is a little height but it doesn't bother me at all. I would buy again without hesitation and I do recommend this item 100%. Read more
items.author: Shirley

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect gown
items.body: The gown is true to size, knee length and long sleeve. The sleeves are a little long which isn’t a problem for me. Light weight and very soft and comfortable. Maybe my favorite gown ever. Its hard to find the perfect gown , knee length, long sleeve , soft. The V neck trim in satin makes it not so plain. I loved it so much I bought a second one. It washed well and dried in dryer, it did not shrink or come out wrinkled. It’s not cheap but worth the price. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Such soft fabric that stays cool!
items.body: The fabric is super soft - almost satin-like, but has plenty of stretch and stays cool! Very light-weight and breathable. The sleeves are an odd length, which is why I gave 4 stars instead of 5. They hit just above the wrist - too long to be 3/4 sleeves, and too short to be full sleeves. Overall super comfy, with mildly annoying sleeve length. Read more
items.author: Jackie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very happy with this nightgown.
items.body: Love this nightgown. Very soft and comfortable. Looks nice and fits well Read more
items.author: Diane B.J.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fabric feels comfy.
items.body: Comfortable, and the size is correct. Read more
items.author: Goose Creek Grandma

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Go with this brand & you won't be sorry!
items.body: I've tried several other brands of bamboo night shirts and these are simply THE BEST! I returned the other brands and kept these. They are ultra soft, keep your temp consistent during sleep, and wash up like a dream. I now own 4 long sleeve and 4 short sleeve of Nachila nightgowns. I love them! I'm disappointed that I didn't discover them sooner! Read more
items.author: Bush

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wonderful fabric
items.body: Perfect weight fabric. Love this gown! Read more
items.author: Sumner Foster

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars A beautiful and comfortable go
items.body: This nightgown is beautiful. The fabric is comfortable and I like the sleeves that keep me warm on chilly nights. The purple color is lovely. Read more
items.author: Lolo

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: F-ink Blue, F-turquoise, B-black, F-aqua Green, A-sky Blue, B-aqua Green, B-navy Blue, C-dark Grey, B-teal Blue, E-pink, A-dark Grey, E-black, F-deep Purple, C-sky Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
